document.full_text: a rare world war two german bomber, shot down over the english channel in 1940 and hidden for years by shifting sands at the bottom of the sea, is so well preserved a british museum wants to raise it.
document.title: nazi warplane lying off uk coast is intact
lines_and_colors: a rare world war two german bomber, shot down over the english channel in 1940 and hidden for years by shifting sands at the bottom of the sea, is so well preserved a british museum wants to raise it.
